website_summaries.verdict: Though these shoes aren't for everyone, they are a great choice for those who like well-made high heels that grab lots of attention for their striking style.
cons: Bright color not as versatile as less bold colors or neutral shades

customer_reviews.title: Beware not Aldo
customer_reviews.text: These must be a knock off. My closest is full of Aldo Cassedy pumps of every color. I figured since these were cheaper I would try them out, well I rather spend the extra 30 and buy directly from Aldo. I compared the inside of the shoe to my other Aldo shoes and the logo isn't even the same. The shoe stained my foot black after wearing them only once and a week later my heel is still black. The fit is all wrong my Aldos never scrape the back of my foot and these scrape so bad I have a mark. I'm returning these fake imitation pumps. Ladies spend the extra money and get directly from Aldo.
customer_reviews.author: Quieonna Renee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty color, they were just what I was looking for. Although, the toes fit very very small for the style. I have another pair in grey and they do not fit this snug. They are also a bit taller then my other pair that I bought it store, that’s the downside of ordering from amazon. Overall they are a pretty but uncomfortable. Most likely wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I definitely can't wear them all night but they are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The style of these shoes is perfect. I do however find they fit quite small
customer_reviews.text: The style of these shoes is perfect. I do however find they fit quite small. I normally wear an 8.5, sometimes a 9, but even the 9 is small in these. Really beautiful color though and the suede is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: way too small. I cant wear them for more than an hour. Forget about dancing in them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe & comfortable. The only problem is that the heel is ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe & comfortable. The only problem is that the heel is so skinny it got stuck in escalator slit.
customer_reviews.author: The Mom & Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Very tight
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe but it runs small. I ordered a size up and my right foot could barely squeeze into it, and when it did my toes were so uncomfortable. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Aricka Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes a 2 weeks ago and I've worn it several times already, it turns an outfit from simple to fab. It fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 fit more like a size 5
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute pump, unfortunately way to small. I usually wear a size 6.5, but these 6.5 fit more like a size 5.5.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Vega

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but OUCH!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful color, however they have very little arch support and even though they are the correct size, they seem to run small; If you decide on these, I would recommend at least a half size larger, and you may want to purchase a arch insole. This is very unusual for Aldo; so I really think it has to do with this particular style!
customer_reviews.author: TexasBelle, TX

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but I should've orderdered a half size bigger because ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but I should've orderdered a half size bigger because they run a little small. i have it five stars because it's prettier when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Meera Salas

product_meta.title: ALDO Women's Cassedy Dress Pump
product_meta.description: Ladies high heel high back pump with pointy toe
